attributes.action: Protect the disabled and the mentally unfit for work.
attributes.additional_details: As a disabled person myself, struggling with mental health conditions, physical health conditions and disabilities, the Universal Credit funding I receive is my only source of income. Without this, myself and so many other vulnerable people will continue to get sicker without being able to fund a disabled lifestyle. We are suffering and will only decline if these benefits are removed from us.
attributes.background: We want Universal Credit and PIP properly funded regularly, and to not live in fear of being forced into work, as sick and disabled people are suffering.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Protect Disabled people who cannot work from planned cuts to benefits
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721547
